adminRolesLimit:
You can only select up to %s Administrator Roles in your server.
Upgrade to **EazyAutodelete Premium ‚ú®** to select up to **%s Administrator Roles**.
afterHeading: Delete messages only after a message
attributes10:
Only messages that have __ONE OR MORE__ of the following attributes will be deleted:
%s
attributes10desc: Only delete messages that have ONE OR MORE selected attributes
attributes10info: Only delete messages that __have ONE OR MORE__ of the selected attributes.
attributes20:
Only messages that have __ALL__ of the following attributes will be deleted:
%s
attributes20desc: Only delete messages that have ALL selected attributes.
attributes20info: Only delete messages that __have ALL__ of the selected attributes.
autodeleteFiltersInfo:
You can choose from a wide variety of filters and combine them in any way you like.
To delete all messages, don't select any filters.
You can also configure whether a message must meet all filters or only at least one filter within a category in order to be deleted.
autodeleteInfo:
EazyAutodelete deletes messages based on user-created **configs**. A config only applies to **the channel in which you ran the command**. You can create up to %s configs per channel, with the [Premium version](https://eazyautodelete.xyz/premium) even more.

1. Run </setup:1069983727855349797> and select "Create Config" to create a new config.

2. You can choose **different modes** for your config. If you wish to delete each message after x seconds, use mode 1. If you wish to delete all messages every x seconds, use mode 2. There are more modes to try out. Read more about them [here](https://docs.eazyautodelete.xyz/config/modes).

3. Once you have selected a mode, you can select **as many filters as you like**. In addition, you can set certain roles to be targeted or ignored as well as automatically applying your configs to new threads and so much more.

4. Finally, you select a limit value for your config. Depending on the mode, this is either a **duration or an amount of messages**.

5. After changing your config, EazyAutodelete will ask you whether you want to **load old messages**. If you wish messages that were sent before you set up the bot in this channel to be deleted, select yes, otherwise select no.

And that's it. Your good to go. After one minute, EazyAutodelete will start working just as you configured it to.
autodeleteIntro:
Welcome to **EazyAutodelete**! üéâ

I'm a fully customizable Discord Bot that automatically deletes messages based on your configurations.

Here is how I work and how you can easily set me up to autodelete messages in your server.

If you have not added me to your server yet, please read [__how to add me to Your Server__](https://docs.eazyautodelete.xyz/add-to-server) first!

If you have any questions or problems, visit our [support server](https://eazyautodelete.xyz/support).
autodeleteLimitInfo:
The "limit" is the value with which the specified mode works.
For example, if you pick mode 3, the limit decides how many messages to wait before deleting them.
autodeleteModesInfo: The mode determines how this configuration works. It alters the way the deletion algorithm works.
autodeleteNoticeDescription: This server uses [**EazyAutodelete**](https://eazyautodelete.xyz) to automatically delete messages in this channel. The following autodelete configurations are active in this channel.
autodeleteNoticeError: Sending the Autodelete notice has failed. Please check whether I have the permission to send messages and use embed links.
autodeleteNoticeSuccess:
The Autodelete notice has been sent. Feel free to pin it.
EazyAutodelete will not delete that message, but you can delete or resend it at any time.
autodeleteNoticeTitle: Messages in this channel are automatically deleted
autodeleteOldMessagesInfo:
With EazyAutodelete, you can load messages from up to 14 days ago and process them as if EazyAutodelete had been configured the way it is now when the messages were sent.
You can choose to load old messages each time you edit the configuration.
This process may take a few minutes if there are many messages in the channel.
autodeleteStart: EazyAutodelete starts deleting messages according to your configurations one minute after the last change.
automatedMessage: This is an automated message by <@%s>.
beforeHeading: Delete messages only before a message
behaviorInfo:
Select either
> 1) delete only messages that match **AT LEAST ONE filter** of a category *or*
> 2) delete only messages that match **ALL filters** of a category.
blockedForAbuse:
We suspect that you have abused our systems, which is why we have blocked you from accessing them and stopped all your configs.
This is purely a precautionary measure. However, if you believe this to be unjustified, please reach out to us via our [support server](%s), and we will endeavour to resolve the inconvenience.
botIsMissingPerms: I am missing the following permissions to execute that command:
botNotReady: Bot is not ready yet. Please wait a few seconds and try again. %s
changeLimit1: Click on the __%s__ button to set a duration after which each message gets deleted.
changeLimit2: Click on the __%s__ button to set the interval at which the bot deletes messages in the channel.
changeLimit3: Click the __%s__ button to set the amout of messages after which all messages get deleted.
changeLimit4: Click on the __%s__ button to set the number of new messages to keep.
changeTime5: Click the __%s__ button to set the daily message deletion time.

You reached the maximum amount of %s configs per channel.
:sparkles: The [premium plan](%s) allows you to create up to %s configs per channel.

This channel is the log channel for <#%s>.

configFilterInfo:

You can also modify how the filters work by changing the filter behavior.

duplicateConfirm:
### Are you sure you want to duplicate this channel?
This will create a copy of this channel with the same settings, name and description, and delete the old channel.

__ALL MESSAGES IN THIS CHANNEL WILL BE GONE__.
%s

-# The new channel will be assigned a new ID. This can lead to problems with bots that are configured for this specific channel ID.

lazyloadAsk: Do you want EazyAutodelete to load and delete old messages sent before the bot was set up?
lazyloadDisabled: EazyAutodelete will not load old messages.
lazyloadEnabled: EazyAutodelete will now start loading old messages.
lazyloadInfo: This can take from a few minutes up to several hours, depending on the amount of messages in this channel.
lazyloadNo: No, do not load old messages
lazyloadStart: EazyAutodelete will start loading old messages in this channel %s. This might take a few minutes.
limit:
De limiet waarmee het verwijderalgoritme moet werken.
Gespecificeerd als duur of getal, afhankelijk van de ingestelde modus.
limitMode0: De limiet waarmee het verwijderingsalgoritme zou moeten werken. Deze optie is uitgeschakeld, aangezien modus 0 is geactiveerd. Er worden geen berichten verwijderd.
limitMode1:
Het limiet waar het verwijder algoritme mee moet werken, gespecificeerd als een **tijdsduur**, omdat modus 1 is geactiveerd.
Voorbeeld: `1m 30s`
limitMode2:
Het limiet waar het verwijder algoritme mee moet werken, gespecificeerd als een **tijdsduur**, omdat modus 2 is geactiveerd.
Voorbeeld: `2m 30s`
limitMode3:
Het limiet waar het verwijder algoritme mee moet werken, gespecificeerd als een **getal**, omdat modus 3 is geactiveerd.
Voorbeeld: `15`
limitMode4:
Het limiet waar het verwijder algoritme mee moet werken, gespecificeerd als een **getal**, omdat modus 4 is geactiveerd.
Voorbeeld: `10`
limitMode5:
The time to run the daily message deletion at. Specified as **HH:mm** (24h format), since mode 5 is activated. Provide in UTC¬±0 Timezone. Midnight for EazyAutodelete is %s.
Example: `16:30`

mode1: Verwijder verzonden berichten na een bepaalde tijd (vb: na 30 seconden).
mode2: Verwijdert berichten na een bepaald interval (bijv: elke 30 seconden).
mode3: Verwijder berichten na een bepaald aantal berichten (vb: elke 10 berichten).

mode5: Delete all messages daily at a specific time.

premiumFooter: Better limits and more configs result in higher server load. Therefore, premium users have better limits as they help cover the server costs.
premiumInfo:
Subscribe to EazyAutodelete Premium to get access to more features, better limits and support the development of the project.

We use your payments to finance the server infrastructure, domains, licenses and other costs.
### When having an active Premium Subscription, you will receive following perks:
:gear: Create up to %s configs per channel
:busts_in_silhouette: More Target, Ignore, Mod & Admin Roles ([**?**](<https://docs.eazyautodelete.xyz/config/roles>))
:chart_with_upwards_trend: Better limits up to `%s`
:one: You & your channels are handled first!
‚Ä¶and more to follow
### If you have any questions:
`>` Read the FAQ in our </support:1069983727855349796> server
`>` Feel free to ask in our </support:1069983727855349796> server
`>` Read in the [Docs](<https://docs.eazyautodelete.xyz/premium>)

__You can subscribe to EazyAutodelete Premium by clicking the first Button below!__

-# Better limits and more configs result in higher server load. Therefore, premium users have access to better limits as they help cover the server costs.

The command could not be executed completely. There may be various reasons for this. Check whether the requirements for the channel are met. EazyAutodelete may have a higher load at the moment, you can try again in a few minutes.

Progress: %s of %s messages purged
%s (%s%)

EazyAutodelete purged %s messages in this channel. Skipped %s messages.

resetSetting:
**Instellingen zijn succesvol opgeslagen.**
De instelling is opgeslagen en heeft geen effect meer op het verwijderen van berichten.
rolesDesc: You can select roles to either target or ignore.
rolesFooter: Setting "Target Roles" clears "Ignore Roles", and vice versa.
rolesInfo:
You can select roles to either target or ignore. This only works for user-created roles, not automatically created bot roles.

**Target Roles:**
Only delete messages from members with one or more of the roles.

**Ignore Roles:**
Ignore messages from members with one or more of the roles.
rolesLimit:
You have reached the limit of %s Roles.
Upgrade to **EazyAutodelete Premium ‚ú®** to select up to **%s Roles**.
sameLimit: That's the same limit as before.
selectModeInfo:
The Mode defines how the Deletion Algorithm works. The __current Mode is %s__.
Select a Mode to get a preview and description.
serverRolesDescription:
You can select specific roles that will give members access to specific commands.
`>` Members with an Administrator Role can create, edit and delete configurations, shares and more.
`>` Members with a Moderator Role have access to the logs.
serverRolesUpdated: The Server Roles Permissions have been updated.
serverRolesWarning: Be very careful with these settings. Especially with an Administrator Role, wrong users can do a lot of damage to your server.
serverStopped: All configs in this server have been stopped.

U kunt meer informatie over de status krijgen op de [**Statuspagina**](%s) en op onze [**Discordserver**](%s).
stopChannel:
**Are you sure you want to stop ALL configs in this channel?**
The affected configs are stopped immediately, the mode is set to 0 and the limit is reset.
stopConfirm:
**Do you only want to stop all configs in this channel or on the entire server?**
The affected configs are stopped, the mode is set to 0 and the limit is reset.
stopServer:
**Are you sure you want to stop ALL configs in this server?**
The affected configs are stopped immediately, the mode is set to 0 and the limit is reset.
support:

U kunt ook zelf een oplossing zoeken in de [**Documentatie**](%s).

userIsNew:
Zo te zien gebruikt u EazyAutodelete voor het eerst.
Handig is uw taal naar keuze in te stellen. Doe dit met het **/language** commando.

Begin daarna met het opzetten van EazyAutodelete in een kanaal met **/setup**.

Gebruik **/help** voor informatie over een commando.
Voor vragen of problemen kunt u altijd **/support** gebruiken.
